Attacks.Name: Stone Axe
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt.

Attacks.Name: X-Scissor
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, push the target character away short. This push is resolved even if the attack deals no damage.

Attacks.Name: Fury Cutter
Attacks.Effect: If this attack deals damage, increase its strength by 2 for the next time it's used during this character's activation. This effect can stack up to a maximum strength of 9. If the character does not use Fury Cutter during its next activation, reset the strength back to 3.

Superpowers.Name: Iron Defense
Superpowers.Effect: Until the start of your next turn, when Kleavor is targeted by an attack, it may use its normal defense regardless of the type of attack.

Superpowers.Name: Swarm
Superpowers.Effect: When this character has 3 or fewer stamina remaining, add 2 dice to its attack rolls.

Attacks.Name: Stone Edge
Attacks.Effect: When rolling attack dice for this move, treat both critical and wild results as critical successes, allowing you to roll an additional die for each.
